citations.narrative:
Several of the vertical strips of PVC composite material, used in the small breed dog enclosures, have areas of chew
damage. The damage ranges from deep scratches in the material to areas where most of the material has been chewed
off the wall.
It's important for primary enclosures to be kept in good repair to ensure that the surfaces can be cleaned appropriately
and that dogs are not consuming materials which could affect their health.
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that all surfaces in contact with the dogs are able to be readily
cleaned and sanitized or replaced when worn or soiled.
Correct by: 8/28/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Several of the vertical strips of PVC composite material, used in the small breed dog enclosures, have areas of chew 
damage.  The damage ranges from deep scratches in the material to areas where most of the material has been chewed 
off the wall. 
It's important for primary enclosures to be kept in good repair to ensure that the surfaces can be cleaned appropriately 
and that dogs are not consuming materials which could affect their health.  
Primary enclosures must be constructed and maintained so that all surfaces in contact with the dogs are able to be readily 
cleaned and sanitized or replaced when worn or soiled.   
Correct by: 8/28/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
